## Take part in 3 research studies and get a chance to win a £100 Amazon voucher!


We are looking for participants to take part in three research studies that explore how people think and make decisions. At the end of each study we will give you a code. Enter the codes from all three studies into the form at the end of this page to be entered into a prize draw to win a £100 Amazon voucher.

![](images/challenge_poster.png){width=50% fig-align="center"}


### Step 1: Be sure you are registered in our research participant pool

If you have not already done so, please register in our [research participant pool](https://tees.sona-systems.com/Default.aspx?ReturnUrl=%2fmain.aspx). This will enable you to take part in our studies and be entered into the prize draw.

![](images/sona1.png){width=50% fig-align="center"}

### Step 2: Take part in the studies

You can take part in the studies in any order. Each study will take approximately 20-30 minutes to complete.

| [The Language Study](https://tees.onlinesurveys.ac.uk/mind-lab-research-challenge-study-1){.btn .btn-primary} | [The Decision Making Study](https://tees.onlinesurveys.ac.uk/mind-lab-research-challenge-study-2){.btn .btn-primary} | [The Memory Study](https://tees.onlinesurveys.ac.uk/mind-lab-research-challenge-study-3){.btn .btn-primary} |

### Step 3: Enter the codes from each study into the form below

At the end of each study you will be given a code. Please enter the codes from all three studies into the form below to be entered into the prize draw to win a £100 Amazon voucher.
